README.html.title: Welcome to the ERP.net Educational Documentation! | ERP.net Edu Docs
README.html.keywords: Welcome to the ERP.net Educational Documentation! The documentation uses DocFX to build.

index.html.title: Welcome to ERP.net docs | ERP.net Edu Docs
index.html.keywords: Welcome to ERP.net docs Explore the different aspects of the ERP.net Platform. Marketing & Sales Information Information Site - General information about the ERP.net platform and the main UI apps. Useful for prospective customers, partners, marketing research, etc. Client Applications Windows Desktop Client - Information how to setup and use the Windows Desktop Client. Web Client BETA Documentation of the web client, which is still in preview version. Technical Information Technical Documentation - The business logic of the ERP.net platform. Useful for advanced users, implementation consultants, developers, etc. Developer Documentation - Conceptual and reference information about developing applications that consume the ERP.net services. Intended for developers and software architects. Data Model Reference - Detailed reference documentation of the ERP.net data models. Intended for advanced advanced implementation consultants and developers.
